name: Mammal Murder Mayhem
description:
Welcome, detective! We're so glad you're here! Unfortunately, there's been a murder in an otherwise quiet small town. Who could have done such a thing? It's up to you to meet the villagers, gather evidence, and crack the case!

Controls:

AWSD / Arrow keys - Walk

E - enter / leave building

Space - talk to villager / pick up items

Mouse - Open notebook / select dialogue options

Made by Colin Herbert, Dylan Etson, Noah Butler, and Evan Williams
